file: tmp_【3D LIVE - HOPE UPON A STAR 】IRyS 2025 BIRTHDAY LIVE #IRySBDay2025 [V0plPBgyqPs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: IRyS discusses her new EP "YABAI", including physical editions, pre-order info, and limited bonuses.
MC section where IRyS introduces the final song of the live performance, featuring a special guest.
